name: Mayhem 2016
summary: MAYhem 2016 is a 21-level Doom II megawad for Boom-compatible source ports, created by members of the Doomworld forums in June 2016. It is the fifth installment in the MAYhem series, and the first not to be led by TheMionicDonut, with management taken over by Michael Fraize (Marcaek). The WAD used a custom texture pack made up of resources from Quake, The Darkening Episode 2, and Malice. Two restrictions were used, with mappers having a choice of being limited to 160 things in their map, or having a monster count of the map number multiplied by 10.
